languages.text: "Лорд-инквизитор даровал мне честь навести порядок в этом логове пиратов и еретиков. Избавить Футфол от скверны, что сковала его члены и превратила имперскую станцию в оплот свободомыслия и неэффективности. И я не успокоюсь, пока не осужу... каждого".

"The Lord Inquisitor has bestowed upon me the honour of bringing order to this cesspool of pirates and heretics. To rid Footfall of the corruption that has fettered its limbs and turned this Imperial station into a hotbed of freethinking and inefficiency. And I will not rest until all have been judged."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-инквизитор даровал мне честь навести порядок в этом логове пиратов и еретиков. Избавить Футфол от скверны, что сковала его члены и превратила имперскую станцию в оплот свободомыслия и неэффективности. И я не успокоюсь, пока не осужу... каждого".

To rid Footfall of the corruption that has fettered its limbs and turned this Imperial station into a hotbed of freethinking and inefficiency. And I will not rest until all have been judged."
"The Lord Inquisitor has bestowed upon me the honour of being the one who brings order to this cesspool of pirates and heretics. And I shall not rest until all have been judged."

To rid Footfall of the corruption that has fettered its limbs and turned this Imperial station into a hotbed of freethinking and inefficiency. And I will not rest until all have been judged."

languages.text: “大审判官赐予了我殊荣，让我为这个海盗与异端分子横行的贼窝带来秩序。自由主义思想与效率低下的作风玷污了落脚港，把帝国的星站变成了腐化的温床。在所有人接受审判之前，我一刻都不会休息。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor has bestowed upon me the honour of bringing order to this cesspool of pirates and heretics. To rid Footfall of the corruption that has fettered its limbs and turned this Imperial station into a hotbed of freethinking and inefficiency. And I will not rest until all have been judged."

traits.locale_text: “审判长赐予了我殊荣，让我为这个海盗与异端分子横行的贼窝带来秩序。自由主义思想与效率低下的作风玷污了落脚港，把帝国的星站变成了腐化的温床。在所有人接受审判之前，我一刻都不会休息。”

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターは私に、海賊と異端者が集うこの巣窟に秩序をもたらす栄誉を授けられた。フットフォールの手足を縛り付け、自由思想と無能の温床と化したこの帝国基地の腐敗を取り除くために。そして、すべての者が裁かれるまで、私は休むことはない」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor has bestowed upon me the honour of bringing order to this cesspool of pirates and heretics. To rid Footfall of the corruption that has fettered its limbs and turned this Imperial station into a hotbed of freethinking and inefficiency. And I will not rest until all have been judged."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターは私に、海賊と異端者が集うこの巣窟に秩序をもたらす栄誉を授けられた。フットフォールの手足を縛り付け、自由思想と無能の温床と化したこの帝国基地の腐敗を取り除くために。そして、すべての者が裁かれるまで、私は休むことはない」

languages.text: «El Lord Inquisidor me ha otorgado el honor de imponer el orden en este criadero de piratas y herejes. De erradicar de Paso la corrupción que ata sus extremidades, convirtiendo la estación en terreno de cultivo de la ineficacia y el librepensamiento. Y no descansaré hasta haber juzgado a todos».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor has bestowed upon me the honour of bringing order to this cesspool of pirates and heretics. To rid Footfall of the corruption that has fettered its limbs and turned this Imperial station into a hotbed of freethinking and inefficiency. And I will not rest until all have been judged."

traits.locale_text: «El Lord Inquisidor me ha otorgado el honor de imponer el orden en este criadero de piratas y herejes. De erradicar de Paso la corrupción que ata sus extremidades, convirtiendo la estación en terreno de cultivo de la ineficacia y el librepensamiento. Y no descansaré hasta haber juzgado a todos».

languages.text: "Der Großinquisitor hat mir die ehrenvolle Aufgabe übertragen, in diesem Sündenpfuhl von Piraten und Ketzern für Ordnung zu sorgen. Ich soll Footfall von der Verderbtheit befreien, die seine Glieder befallen und diese imperiale Station in eine Brutstätte der Freigeisterei und Ineffizienz verwandelt hat. Und ich werde nicht ruhen, bis über alle geurteilt wurde."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor has bestowed upon me the honour of bringing order to this cesspool of pirates and heretics. To rid Footfall of the corruption that has fettered its limbs and turned this Imperial station into a hotbed of freethinking and inefficiency. And I will not rest until all have been judged."

traits.locale_text: "Der Großinquisitor hat mir die ehrenvolle Aufgabe übertragen, in diesem Sündenpfuhl von Piraten und Ketzern für Ordnung zu sorgen. Und ich werde nicht ruhen, bis über alle geurteilt wurde."

languages.text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a fait l'honneur de me charger de ramener l'ordre dans ce cloaque grouillant de pirates et d'hérétiques et de débarrasser Castel de la corruption qui a entravé le bon fonctionnement de cette station impériale en plus de la transformer en nid d'insubordination et de vanité. Je n'aurai de cesse qu'ils soient tous jugés jusqu'au dernier. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor has bestowed upon me the honour of bringing order to this cesspool of pirates and heretics. To rid Footfall of the corruption that has fettered its limbs and turned this Imperial station into a hotbed of freethinking and inefficiency. And I will not rest until all have been judged."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a fait l'honneur de me charger de ramener l'ordre dans ce cloaque grouillant de pirates et d'hérétiques et de débarrasser Castel de la corruption qui a entravé le bon fonctionnement de cette station impériale en plus de la transformer en nid d'insubordination et de vanité. Je n'aurai de cesse qu'ils soient tous jugés jusqu'au dernier. »

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu, bu korsan ve kâfir inine düzen getirme vazifesini bana bahşetti. Binliman'ın uzuvlarına pranga vurup bu İmparatorluk istasyonunu özgür düşünce ve verimsizlik yuvasına çeviren yozlaşmanın kökünü ben kurutacağım. Herkes yargılanana dek soluklanmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor has bestowed upon me the honour of bringing order to this cesspool of pirates and heretics. To rid Footfall of the corruption that has fettered its limbs and turned this Imperial station into a hotbed of freethinking and inefficiency. And I will not rest until all have been judged."
